snippet: In an effort to beef up China’s energy supply chain as well as its shipbuilding, shipyards plan to take $10 billion in orders for new L.N.G. tankers.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to beef up China’s energy supply chain as well as its shipbuilding, shipyards plan to take $10 billion in orders for new L.N.G. tankers.

headline.main: China Pushes to Build Its Own Ships to Deliver Gas
headline.print_headline: China Pushes to Build Its Own Ships to Deliver Gas
